data.title: Good food!
data.text: I like the food here.  Nice Dominican atmosphere and the food isn't spicy which is great.  Try the Pepper Steak and the sweet Plantain - it's the best.  Wish I knew what they used to season the peppers and onions they served with the steak-yummy!

data.title: Love their food!
data.text: They have the best Spanish food.  Every time I get food there it is great.  My favorite is the Pepper steak, white rice with beans, and the sweet plantain.  Delicious every time.  The flavor is so good - and it's not spicy which I appreciate.

data.title: Casual lunch
data.text: Good food, very clean, excellent service with a nice environment.  Pleasant people with good sense of humor and big smiles

data.title: Delicious!!!
data.text:
Is a part of Republica Dominicana in Boston, you should taste the mofongo stuff with Camarones and the Greygoose with natural passion fruit juice!!!

The owners very happy, they know to run a business and treat their customers!!!

LOVE IT!!!

data.title: Dislike it.
data.text:
I came here to eat something quick and wait for few friends.  I wasn't seated. I did it myself.  Waitress didnt even say hello. 5 minutes later she gave me the menu and left.  After another 5 minutes I ordered  the chicken and tomatoes sauce, fried green plantain and rice with bean inside.   15 minutes later , I received what I ordered,  except the rice. Instead I had white rice with the beans on the side.  I was waiting on the waitress , didnt know where she hided. I ended eating the food. I wasn't impressed at all. Only ate small portion and  ate the fried plantains.  

Very disappointed.  I love my spanish food.  But didnt like this one.  I ll probably visit one more time , to order some seafood.  Maybe..

I hope I recieve a better service and food.

data.title: Rico, Rico 😋
data.text: Ambiente familiar, buen servicio al cliente. La comida exquisita. El menú es muy variado y conservan lo típico de República Dominicana 🇩🇴
